DOC.criteria: Severe vitreous hemorrhage obscure visualization fundus indirect ophthalmoscopy , present > /= 1 month history exam BCVA worse 20/200 time screen Corneal lenticular abnormality preclude fundus observation Ongoing ocular infection , inflammation history herpetic corneal lesion Current prior retinal detachment retinal tear break intraocular tumor More 1 severe vitreous hemorrhage within 6 month Previous vitrectomy reason Hemorrhage exclusively preretinal , old & organize Prior Vitrase intravitreal injection either eye No light perception either eye time Known contraindication study medication Sickle cell disease
